thread.title: WATCH: Giants fan in Eli Manning jersey punched out by Eagles die-hard
thread.title_full: WATCH: Giants fan in Eli Manning jersey punched out by Eagles die-hard

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: WATCH: Giants fan in Eli Manning jersey punched out by Eagles die-hard
text:
Comments 
Looking for a metaphor for Monday night's Eagles-Giants game in which Philadelphia prevailed in a sloppy contest? 
There's one in the form of a fight between a Giants fan in an Eli Manning jersey and an Eagles die-hard. 
PLUS: Is putting a Giants jersey on Rocky statue considered a crime? 
The Giants fan screams "Come on, now!" at the train station as he's told to shut up. When the Manning supporter stops and turns to face a would-be attacker, a fan in an Eagles jacket throws a few punches and drops his Giants counterpart to the ground, leaving the trash talker dazed. 
Just like Monday's game, the Giants had the upper hand for a few seconds before the Eagles took over. 
Follow Charles Curtis on Twitter @charlescurtis82 . Find NJ.com on Facebook
